overview:
Marcy Marshall joined Arboretum in 2004. She is responsible for the financial operations of the firm, including investor reporting, serving as the primary contact with outside accounting and tax providers, and organizing portfolio company reserve and performance projections.

Prior to joining Arboretum, Marcy was an adjunct faculty member in the accounting department at Davenport University. Previously, she spent ten years working in financial analysis and held management positions at ITT Consumer Financial Corporation, 3M Corporation, and May Department Stores Company.

Marcy is a member of the National Venture Capital Association’s CFO Task Force and keeps Arboretum’s Managing Directors apprised of recent trends in portfolio company valuation standards, IRS and SEC regulations, and related matters.
